title: Linux Mint 21.2 “EDGE” ISO Released with Linux Kernel 6.2, Secure Boot Support
description:
Linux Mint 21.2 "EDGE" ISO flavor is now available for download powered by Linux kernel 6.2 and featuring Secure Boot support.

The post Linux Mint 21.2 “EDGE” ISO Released with Linux Kernel 6.2, Secure Boot Support appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
